name: This is a True Story
description:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

Explore a beautiful, hand-painted landscape in this lush narrative puzzle game that's based on actual events and interviews.

Survive a windstorm, catch poachers, and even befriend a goat! Adventure and insight await you at every turn as you search for water and marvel at Earth’s natural beauty.

Features include:
• Original short story based on actual events and interviews
• Beautiful hand-painted art
• Simple, intuitive controls
• Puzzle, hidden-object and side-scrolling gameplay (plus more)
• Dozens of exciting chapters to explore
• Original soundtrack
